Value.label: LED Indicator Mode for Dimmer
Value.Help: Choose if you want the LED indicator to turn on when the switch (light) is on or off, or if you want it to remain on or off at all times. This setting is for the top status indicator only.

Item.label: LED is on when light is OFF
LED is on when light is ON

Value.label: LED Indicator Control for Relay
Value.Help: Choose if you want the LED indicator to turn on when the relay is on or off, or if you want it to remain on or off at all times

Item.label: LED is on when light is OFF
LED is on when light is ON

Value.label: LED Indicator Color for Dimmer
Value.Help: Choose the color of the LED indicators for the dimmer.

Value.label: LED Indicator Color for Relay
Value.Help: Choose the color of the LED indicator for the relay.

Value.label: LED Indicator Brightness for Dimmer
Value.Help: Choose the LED indicators’ brightness level for the dimmer.

Value.label: LED Indicator Brightness for Relay
Value.Help: Choose the LED indicators’ brightness level for the relay.

Value.label: LED Indicator Mode for Scene Control
Value.Help: Choose if you want the LED indicators next to the dimmer to light up when a scene is selected. You’ll see 1 to 5 LEDs light up for 1 – 5 tap triggers and 6 LEDs light up for the press-and-hold trigger of any paddle / button used.

Value.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Dimmer
Value.Help: Use this parameter to set the time after which you want the dimmer to automatically turn off once it has been turned on. The number entered as value corresponds to the number of minutes.

Value.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Dimmer
Value.Help: Use this parameter to set the time after which you want the dimmer to automatically turn on once it has been turned off. The number entered as value corresponds to the number of minutes.

Value.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay
Value.Help: Use this parameter to set the time after which you want the relay to automatically turn off once it has been turned on. The number entered as value corresponds to the number of minutes.

Value.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay
Value.Help: Use this parameter to set the time after which you want the relay to automatically turn on once it has been turned off. The number entered as value corresponds to the number of minutes.

Value.label: On Off Status After Power Failure
Value.Help: Set the on/off status of the device after power failure.

Item.label: Dimmer and relay forced to off (regardless of state prior to power outage)
Dimmer forced to off, relay forced to on
Dimmer forced to on, relay forced to off
Remembers and restores on/off status for dimmer and relay after power failure
Remembers and restores on/off status for dimmer, relay forced to on
Remembers and restores on/off status for dimmer, relay forced to off
Dimmer forced to on, remembers and restores on/off status for relay
Dimmer forced to off, remembers and restores on/off status for relay
Dimmer and relay forced to on

Value.label: Ramp Rate Control for Dimmer
Value.Help: Adjust the ramp rate for the dimmer (fade-in / fade-out effect for on/off operation). Values correspond to the number of seconds it takes for the dimmer to reach full brightness or turn off when operated manually.

Value.label: Minimum Brightness
Value.Help: Set the minimum brightness level (in %) for the dimmer. You won’t be able to dim the light below the set value.

Value.label: Maximum Brightness
Value.Help: Set the maximum brightness level (in %) for the dimmer. You won’t be able to add brightness to the light beyond the set value.

Value.label: Double Tap Function for Dimmer
Value.Help: Choose if you want the dimmer to turn on to full brightness or custom brightness level after you double-tap the upper paddle.

Item.label: Light will turn on to full brightness with double tap
Light will turn on to the maximum brightness level set in Parameter 15 with double tap

Value.label: Disable Double Tap
Value.Help: Enable or disable the double-tap function and assign brightness level to single tap.

Item.label: Double tap to full / maximum brightness level enabled
Double tap to full / maximum brightness level disabled, single tap turns light on to last brightness level (or custom value set in Parameter 23)
Double tap to full / maximum brightness level disabled, single tap turns light on to full brightness level.

Value.label: Enable/Disable Load Control for Dimmer (Smart Bulb Setting)
Value.Help: Enable or disable direct manual and Z-Wave control of the connected light. Works great for smart bulb control. If disabled, the dimmer will no longer control the connected bulb directly but will still send on/off and brightness reports to the hub so you can use them to create automations for your smart bulbs or other switches. Scenes and other functionality will still be available through paddles.

Value.label: Enable/Disable Load Control for Relay (Remote Control Setting)
Value.Help: Enable or disable direct manual and Z-Wave control of the connected load. Works great for smart bulbs or any type of remote / scene control. If disabled, the relay will no longer control the connected load directly but will still send on/off reports to the hub so you can use them to create automations for your smart bulbs or other devices. Scenes and other functionality will still be available through the button.

Value.label: Manual Dimming Speed
Value.Help: Choose how many seconds it takes for the dimmer to go from 0% to 100% brightness when pressing and holding the paddle. Increase the value to decrease the dimming speed.

Value.label: Z-Wave Ramp Rate for Dimmer
Value.Help: Choose if you would like to match the Z-Wave on/off ramp rate with the manual ramp rate or set it separately in your hub.

Item.label: Z-Wave on/off ramp rate matches the manual ramp rate set in Parameter 13.
Z-Wave on/off ramp rate is set separately through its command class in the hub.

Value.label: Default Brightness Level On for Dimmer
Value.Help: Set single tap custom brightness level (in %) for the dimmer to come on to pause
